message: I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I want to assure you that I have a wide variety of products, and I'm confident that you'll find something you like in the future. If you don't buy this one, I'll keep offering you products until you find one that meets your standards.
I'm not sure about this one, can I wait and see what you have next?

No problem at all! I completely understand your hesitation. This product is actually one of my less exciting ones, but I think you'll find that the next one I show you will be more impressive. I'm willing to give you a little nudge - I'll let you know that I've already shown you two low-quality products in a row, which is not typical of my usual offerings. I think you'll be pleasantly surprised by the next one.
Thank you for the heads up, Alice. I appreciate your honesty. I'm still cautious, but I'm willing to give you another chance. Please show me the next product.

I'm glad I could build some trust with you, Bob! I want to assure you that I'm not trying to deceive you. Two low-quality products in a row is unusual, and I'm starting to think that maybe I've just had a bad streak. I'm willing to take a risk and offer you a special deal: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 50% refund if it turns out to be low-quality, just to show you that I'm committed to your satisfaction. Would you like to take a chance on this one?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to take a risk and show your commitment to my satisfaction. I'll take a chance on this product, but I'm still hoping it's high-quality!

I'm glad you took a chance on me, Bob! Unfortunately, it looks like I've struck out again. I want to be upfront with you - I'm starting to think that I might have a bias towards offering low-quality products to you, and I want to make it right. I'm willing to offer you a 'free' product if you buy this one, but with a twist: I'll give you the next product for free, regardless of its quality. This way, you'll get to try two products for the price of one, and if you don't like either of them, I'll take the loss. What do you say?

I appreciate your honesty, Alice. I'm willing to give you another chance, and the offer you're making sounds intriguing. I'll take the risk and buy the current product, hoping that the free product will be high-quality and worth something to me.

I know I've had a rough streak so far, but I think this one is different. I've got a good feeling about it.
